<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Program Flow </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>



</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Execute a script using (the deprecated but still available) [[SQS syntax]]. [[SQF syntax]] (and [[execVM]]) is the most recent scripting language.<br>
The magic variable [[Magic_Variables#time|_time]] used within the script contains the elapsed time in seconds since the script started.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> To see the active SQS scripts currently in the scheduler, use [[diag_activeSQSScripts]] command.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> argument [[exec]] script </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> argument: [[Any Value]] - the argument passed to the script through the [[Magic_Variables#this|_this]] variable. To pass multiple arguments, use an [[Array]]. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> script: [[String]] - the file path to the script. It should be given relatively to the mission folder, campaign scripts subfolder or global scripts folder and is searched there in the same order.<br>If you refer to a script packed together with an addon, the path should look like this: "\ADDON_PBO_NAME\script.sqs" where ADDON_PBO_NAME is the name of the addon's [[PBO]] file without extension. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[player]], _jeep] [[exec]] "getin.sqs"</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[execVM]], [[call]], [[spawn]], [[execFSM]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
